participant_1.background:
I went back to school to study medicine, like my father.
my doctor told me i have six months to live.
I want to learn how to finish drywall like my dad.
I love spending time with my dog, she's my best friend!
I'm proud of the love and care I give to my family and pets.

participant_2.background:
I dressed up as a cat last Halloween.
My appearance is not that important to me, as I would rather focus on my passions and relationships.
I enjoy my job but would like more time to sleep.
My favorite type of fruit is watermelon, it is sweet and refreshing, and it reminds me of summer.
I'm interested in learning more about native plants and how to grow them in my garden.

content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1. What's yours?
I'm interested in learning more about native plants and how to grow them in my garden.
That's interesting! I'm a bit of a plant nerd myself. I've been growing watermelons in my garden this summer.
Wow! I love watermelon. I dressed up as a cat for Halloween last year.
That's so funny! I'm not really into dressing up, but my dog loves to wear costumes.
Dogs are so cute! I'm glad you have a good relationship with your family and pets.
Thanks! I'm really proud of the love and care I give to them.
It sounds like you're a very kind and caring person.
I'm glad I met you, participant_2.
